reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very poor hotel, I know it was cheap but that is no excuse, staff could not speak english well, did not care if there were problems with room, gave no apologies for a room that had not been cleaned, still sheets on floor and dirty cups everywehere. Food in bar was expensive and inedible, we sent ours back and tried something else which was also inedible, worst food I have ever had, I will never stay here again, just pay a bit more, its worth that extra!!!!
reviews.title: Poor

reviews.text: Is ok. Was worried sick about what it would be like & what would happen to the car after reading so many bad reviews.
reviews.title: Very good value for your money

likes.liked: — Great price for parking Car for 8 days with 1 nights accomodation
likes.disliked: — The room felt damp, heating should be put on

reviews.text: Maybe its best to go expecting the worse & it can only be better.
reviews.title: Not the best hotel in the area.. but we've been to worse!

likes.liked: — Ginger Biscuits!!! The bar meal was excellent and the price was right
likes.disliked: — The hotel needs completely redecorating. Vague feeling of unease over parking facillities.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived in the evening so only saw the building in the dark. The Hallway/Reception could do with a decorate as is a bit dated with its dark dull wood, but it was ok.
reviews.title: Ok for one night

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Reception staff & onto car staff were fine no complaints at all.
reviews.title: Not as bad as people say!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The whole place stank of fags. tiny room, shower didnt work properly, TV would only get 2 channels, uncomfortable bed. Its a cheap place and they make their money by gouging you for drinks, £8.10 for a diet coke and a pint of flat beer.
reviews.title: Pay extra and stay somewehere else.
So Nice Yet So Cheap
reviews.text: The transfer to the airport was fine (£5 return on top of hotel and parking )although we had about a 25 minute wait when we returned. Our car had been moved into an unsurfaced field about 300 yards from the hotel and due to a downpour it was a bog.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a three-star hotel very close to Gatwick Airport. With M25 turning into a Parking zone on rush hour, I never wanted to risk traveling on the day of my flight. So I stayed the night before my flight. They operate a 24-hour airport transfer at a cost of about £ 3!
reviews.title: Not THAT bad !!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is even a car park and the room was only £39.
reviews.title: WHY TAKE THE RISK?!? This place is grim! Grim! GRIM!

likes.liked: — That it was possible to escape after one night.
likes.disliked: — That we had to spend even one night.

reviews.text: What else can you ask for. I booked online through Holiday Extras web site.
reviews.title: Be warned or suffer the consequences…

likes.disliked: — Parking is something you should 100% avoid!

reviews.title: NO PROBLEMS
reviews.text: My Husband and myself used this hotel to park our car for 3 weeks, we arrived at the hotel in plenty of time to check in, and transfer to the airport, the check in process was simple, and very quick, the car park is busy, and it can be difficult to find a space, but we found one!

On our return we found the bus was a little late (1/2 hour). On arriving at the hotel we collected our car key's no problem's, the car was all in one piece... HEY PRESTO. It was £84.00 for 3 weeks... what's there to complain about..?. It does state BUDGET PARKING!! You get what you pay for! We had no complaints with the service provided. And would gladly use Russ Hill again.
reviews.title: Value for Money

reviews.text: We stayed in the hotel overnight before our flight from Gatwick. The room we had was clean and pleasant although greatly in need of redecoration. The bathroom was clean although the shower curtain was a bit grubby. It was clear that the hotel was once very grand but has become a bit shabby. A big criticism would be that there appeared to be no lift in the hotel which meant carrying our cases up the stairs. The rooms are double glazed but aircraft noise is still quite loud but what do you expect staying near a very large airport? I would highly reccomend getting exact directions off the internet to the
reviews.title: It was OK!!!

reviews.text: hotel instead of relying on maps as the hotel is very tricky to find. We parked two cars at the hotel for a fortnight without any problems at all. The shuttle to the airport was prompt although a bit expensive at £2.50 per person. Overall the hotel was value for money but dont expect 5 star quality as you only get what you pay for! I would reccommend this hotel and would return there myself. A great stop over hotel!
reviews.title: Never Again

likes.disliked: — poor english speaking bar staff, no air con,

reviews.title: You'll regret staying here
reviews.text: We stayed here on 4th August prior to flying to the USA on 5th for 3 weeks. We have stayed here before and this is the 3rd time in the last 3 years. I found this website after booking it for this years holiday and wondered whether I had done the right thing and what would happen to my car while we were away especially as we were going for 3 weeks.

A tired, run down hotel that looks good from the outside but deteriorates rapidly the deeper you venture. Rooms small, not convinced that clean sheets were on the bed and the shower is totally inadequate. View from the room was onto rusty bits of metal and bricks and rubbish. Carpets threadbare and there was no lift which is not on if you have to transport suitcases. Food adequate but disinterested staff on duty.
reviews.title: Dreadful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Poor, poor, poor!!
reviews.title: Bloody awful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We used this hotel for one night and for parking for 14 days. Never again......the hotel was grubby, room looked as if it had not been decorated in 30 yeards and for a double room, there was frankly not enough room to swing a cat round in.
reviews.title: God Awful Place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff on the front desk were abrupt, not at all helpful, when we asked where the room was, the receptionist just said 'up there'. As our flight was an early departure, we ordered a taxi that never arrived, had to get the bus and only just made the flight. The buses do NOT run 24 hours.
reviews.title: An Unsatisfactory Hoteln

reviews.text: Hotel is some way out from Gatwick. Next time I will use another hotel and avoid this joint like the plague.
reviews.title: Not as bad as it is painted up to be
